name: Eubie The Bumble Bee and Detective Duck: The Mystery of the Hijinx Curse
name_original: Eubie The Bumble Bee and Detective Duck: The Mystery of the Hijinx Curse
description:
Hi there! Welcome, and thanks for checking out our demo! Play as both Eubie and Detective Duck to explore Unimore Forrest and talk to the other creatures within it. Who knows? You may just uncover the mystery of the missing basket! Have fun! - Team Bees Knees

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Team Members:

Nate Hussey: Programmer 

Robert Highsmith: Puzzle Developer and Programmer

Alison Brannon: Story and Dialogue Writer

Nicole Jansen: Character Artist and Animator

Jen Field: UI Programmer and Music Composer

Chantil Hunt Estevez: Environmental Artist 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
